I think McGonagall's glasses are really cool, I mean, who wouldn't want to have a pair of magical lenses that can see through disguises and detect deception? But, I guess some people might find them a bit intimidating or unusual.

I think McGonagall's glasses are a bit of an iconic part of her character, and those square lenses do make her look quite distinctive. I'd say the certainty is high on this one, because it's pretty obvious what kind of glasses she wears in the Harry Potter series. The polarity is positive, because who doesn't love a good pair of glasses? And the sentiment is neutral, just stating a fact about her appearance.
